title: "30 ‘Starship’ robots now delivering food around South Dakota State University campus"
excerpt: "The company recently deployed a fleet to inaugurate food delivery on the Brookings, South Dakota, campus. The robot food delivery service works in conjunction with the student meal plan and is accessed through Starship’s food delivery smartphone app."
